entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 08 January 2023
